name.str: Hoplite Armor small UHMWPE plate, NIJ III+

//description: when we use Cordura instead of nylon, the description should be changed to reflect that
description: A polygonal ballistic plate with a slightly concave profile, made of UHMWPE.  Its inner surface is covered with ballistic nylon and is labeled "TOP", while the outward-facing surface is labeled "STRIKE FACE".  This plate is rated for NIJ III+, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and then some.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is sized "small" and can only fit in carriers that allow small-sized plates.
